name: Oki Electric Industry Company
overview:
Oki Electric Industry Company, Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of products, technologies, software, and solutions for telecommunications and information systems in Asia, Europe, and North America. The companyâ€™s Info-telecom systems product line includes various telecommunications products, such as CTstage contact center system, eVideo, IPstage MX/SX all in one IP communication systems for small offices, and Visual Nexus video conferencing systems for enterprises; and CenterStage NX Series carrier-grade communication servers, eSound VoIP software library, GE-PONII system for carrier-grade broadband services, Next Generation Networks, and Mobile WiMAX system for high-speed wireless broadband access for telecom carriers. Its Info-telecom systems products also comprise mechatronics, such as automated teller machines and compact printers for financials; security solutions, including Face Sensing Engine for face image processing; and ITS road and air intelligent transport systems and aeronautical telecommunication network routers. The companyâ€™s Printers product portfolio comprises various printers and facsimiles, such as color printers, multifunction products, mono printers, serial impact dot matrix printers, and fax machines. It also provides network monitoring, cost tracking, and control solutions to electronic forms applications, specialty media handling, and document management.

The company was founded in 1881 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
